title: Poster, "Exhibition poster for "Mies in Berlin,"  The Museum of Modern Art, New York", 2001
signed: In graphite, lower right: Elaine Lustig Cohen
inscribed: Imprinted beneath image, lower left: Elaine Lustig Cohen. Untitled. Mixed Media. 2001. Printed in the U.S.A.
description: Against white background bordered in red: vertical and red vertical and horizontal bars overlay a constructivist collage arrangement of sections of map of Berlin (top, bottom, left); photographic portraits of the architect Mies van der Rohe as a young man (left, right, center); a detail (vertical striations) of the architect's drawing for an early skyscraper (bottom); architectural drawing (perspective view) of another building (center); chair design (linear outline; side view) at upper right; a large, red "G" (for "Gestaltung"?) at lower center.  Exhibition title (in white lettering) at lower right: museum name, exhibition dates "June 21-September 11, 2001" and sponsor names imprinted to left of lower center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Exhibition poster for "Mies in Berlin,"  The Museum of Modern Art, New York", 2001.
2001. Offset lithograph. Gift of Elaine Lustig Cohen. 2002-15-1.
